key_responsibilities: Acts as the grass roots representative for the Member within his or her area of responsibility including answering casework correspondence, verbal communications with constituents, and acting as liaison with federal, district, and local agencies

Performs other duties as assigned
requirements: excellent written and verbal communication skills
an ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
